scenes.description: At the crossroads of destiny, two paths lie before you: The Enchanted Forest to your left, The Forgotten Ruins to your right.

choices.text: Take the path to The Enchanted Forest
Take the path to The Forgotten Ruins

scenes.description: You find yourself in a clearing with two mystical doors carved into the trees and a glowing bucket in the center.

choices.text: Open the door to your left
Open the door to your right
Look in the bucket

scenes.description: A grove where whispers fill the air. A spectral figure guards a stone door.

choices.text: Use the spell from the tome to appease the guardian
Return to the clearing

scenes.description: A cavern shimmering with crystals. A crystal door is sealed by magic.

choices.text: Use the crystal orb to unlock the door
Return to the clearing

scenes.description: You find a rusty key in the bucket.

choices.text: Take the key and use it on the door to the left
Take the key and use it on the door to the right
Leave the key and return to the clearing

scenes.description: Crumbling gates lead into the ruins. A broken statue holds a small chest.

choices.text: Open the door to your left
Open the door to your right
Examine the broken statue

scenes.description: A vast hall with echoes of the past. A heavy iron door stands closed.

choices.text: Use the emblem to unlock the iron door
Return to the gates

scenes.description: A throne room cloaked in shadows. A shadowy door is hidden behind the throne.

choices.text: Use the jewel to reveal the true door
Return to the gates

scenes.description: The spectral guardian vanishes, allowing you to pass. You discover a hidden grove beyond.
The crystal door opens, revealing a chamber filled with ancient treasures. Your journey is rewarded.
As you look at the statue, you notice a small chest. Inside the chest, you find an old, iron key.

choices.text: Take the key and open the door to the left
Take the key and open the door to the right
Leave the key and return to the gates

scenes.description: The emblem unlocks the iron door, revealing an ancient library filled with forgotten knowledge.
The jewel reveals the true door through the shadows. Behind it lies the ancient throne, crowned with priceless artifacts.
